message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $14,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and the market price.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $12,000 is too low for me. How about $13,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $12,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
